Package ball.http.ant.taskdefs

See org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HTTPTask
    Abstract Ant base Task for web API client tasks.
    HTTPTask.Delete
    Ant Task to DELETE.
    HTTPTask.Get
    Ant Task to GET.
    HTTPTask.Head
    Ant Task to HEAD.
    HTTPTask.NameValuePairImpl
    StringAttributeType implementation that includes NameValuePair.
    HTTPTask.Options
    Ant Task to OPTIONS.
    HTTPTask.Patch
    Ant Task to PATCH.
    HTTPTask.Post
    Ant Task to POST.
    HTTPTask.Put
    Ant Task to PUT.
    HTTPTask.Request
    Abstract Ant base Task for DELETE, GET, POST, and PUT operations.
